com.safenetinc.luna.provider.cipher

Class LunaCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.crypto.CipherSpi
      • com.safenetinc.luna.provider.cipher.LunaCipher
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LunaCipherAESCbc, LunaCipherAEScbcISO10126Pad, LunaCipherAESCbcPad, LunaCipherAESCfb128, LunaCipherAESCfb8, LunaCipherAESCtr, LunaCipherAESEcb, LunaCipherAESGcm, LunaCipherAESKw, LunaCipherAESKwp, LunaCipherAESOfb, LunaCipherARIACbc, LunaCipherARIAcbcISO10126Pad, LunaCipherARIACbcPad, LunaCipherARIACfb128, LunaCipherARIACfb8, LunaCipherARIACtr, LunaCipherARIAEcb, LunaCipherARIAOfb, LunaCipherDES3Cbc, LunaCipherDES3CbcISO10126Pad, LunaCipherDES3CbcPad, LunaCipherDES3Ctr, LunaCipherDES3Ecb, LunaCipherDESCbc, LunaCipherDESCbcPad, LunaCipherDESEcb, LunaCipherECIES, LunaCipherPBE, LunaCipherRC2Cbc, LunaCipherRC2CbcPad, LunaCipherRC2Ecb, LunaCipherRC4, LunaCipherRC5Cbc, LunaCipherRC5CbcPad, LunaCipherRC5Ecb, LunaCipherRSAOAEP, LunaCipherRSAPKCS, LunaCipherRSAX509, LunaCipherSM4Cbc, LunaCipherSM4CbcPad, LunaCipherSM4Ecb

    public abstract class LunaCipher
extends javax.crypto.CipherSpi
    The LunaCipher abstract class serves as a base class for all cipher engine classes.

      • engineGetKeySize

        protected int engineGetKeySize(java.security.Key key)
                        throws java.security.InvalidKeyException
        Returns the key size of the given key object in bits.
        Overrides:
        engineGetKeySize in class javax.crypto.CipherSpi
        Parameters:
        key - the key to size up
        Returns:
        the key size of the key, in bits
        Throws:
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - if the key type is not a Luna or RAW secret key, or an RSA key
